SERIES_DESC: Annual number of deaths, by leading causes of deaths
SOURCE_DETAIL: Global Health Estimates 2016, World Health Organisation (WHO).
COMMENT_OBS: Data are presented for the 42 leading causes of death in 2016 (where global number of deaths exceeded 280,000). These causes accounted for 89% of all deaths in 2016. Female deaths rate in relation to the combined male and female death rate are shown for cells where the age specific death rate from a cause, in either sex, exceeds 1,500 per 100,000.
